profile:
RenovAction is a family business, specializing in Quality Products, Professional Workmanship and Outstanding Warranties.  Featuring Energy Saving Insulated Siding, Energy Efficient Windows, and Metal Roofing, RenovAction is your one stop renovation solution.
Serving Ottawa, Orleans, Kanata, Stittsville, Kanata, Embrun, Russel, Winchester, Chesterville, Carleton Place, Smiths Falls, Perth, Brockville, Kemptville, Almonte, Arnprior, Iroquois. Call or email us today at (613) 424-4245 for a free quote and estimate!"
service_area: Ottawa and surrounding regions including Arnprior, Kemptville, Carleton Place, Smith's Falls, Perth, Rockland, Russell, WInchester, Embrun, Alfred, Brockville, etc.

profile:
We are open for business and we are following Covid-19 regulations. Stay Safe.

Bayview Windows is a leading Ottawa area dealer and installer of exterior windows, patio doors and entrance doors. 

Serving satisfied customers in Ottawa Valley and surrounding areas for over 30 years, we are focused on providing expert advice, superior products and impeccable services to our customers.

We do WINTER INSTALLATIONS. 

Call for a free in-home consultation, or to schedule an after hours appointment at our showroom.
hours: 8:00AM to 4:00PM - Monday to Friday + Appointments to suit you.

profile: We're a full service Window & Door sales, service and installation company. We offer high end products with reasonable pricing attached to them. We are privileged to be registered and approved by Natural Resources Canada's Energy Star Program. Our registration number is # EN8412-S76. We have 30 years of residential as well as commercial installation experience under our belt with tens of thousands of successful installations.
